title: How to Create a Fish Using Keyboard Symbols

steps.title: Here is another variation on the fish:
steps.content: Here is another variation on the fish: <ยบ)))><

steps.title: Find the degree sign ยบ.
steps.content: Find the degree sign ยบ. You may have to go to Microsoft Word or another word processor and go to "insert symbol" to get this sign. You can also do a Google search of the degree symbol and copy-and-paste from there.

steps.title: Type a greater than sign followed by a less than sign.
steps.content: Type a greater than sign followed by a less than sign. ><

steps.title: To reverse the direction of the fish, simply follow the steps above in reverse order.
steps.content: To reverse the direction of the fish, simply follow the steps above in reverse order. But be sure to switch the directions of the parentheses and greater/less than signs. You should end up with ><(((ยบ>
